trans-unit.source: drand project
League of Entropy project
devrandom - (default) writes collected entropy into /dev/random device, without increment of kernel counter of available entropy in pool.
trans-unit.target: devrandom -（默认）将收集到的熵写入 /dev/random 设备，而不增加池中可用熵的内核计数器。

trans-unit.source: drb-client can be used as a standalone source of high-quality random number, or as additional source for entropy pool in Linux kernel. Produced amount of entropy should be sufficient to derail attacks based on RNG predictability.
trans-unit.target: drb-client 可以用作高质量随机数的独立来源，也可以用作Linux内核中熵池的其他来源。产生的熵应足以使基于RNG可预测性的攻击脱轨。

trans-unit.source: drb-client constructs each output of entropy from at least quorum (-Q option) distinct inputs. It is assumed at least node_count - quorum + 1 nodes produce truly unpredictable secure random numbers, so any quorum of distinct responses definitely contain at least one truly random input (due to pigeonhole principle).
trans-unit.target: drb-client 至少根据 quorum （ -Q 选项）不同的输入来构造熵的每个输出。假定至少 node_count - quorum + 1 节点产生真正不可预测的安全随机数，所以任何不同响应的 quorum 都肯定包含至少一个真正的随机输入（由于信鸽原理）。

trans-unit.source: drb-client polls list of drand servers with given interval and requests private entropy data portion from each one. Communication between drb-client and drand is protected with AES256-GCM encryption derived on BN-256 curve on top of TLS (this is imposed by drand API format).
trans-unit.target: drb-client 按给定间隔轮询 drand 服务器列表，并从每个服务器请求私有熵数据部分。 drb-client 与 drand 之间的通信受TLS之上的BN-256曲线派生的AES256-GCM加密保护（这由 drand API格式强加）。

trans-unit.source: rndaddentropy - writes collected entropy into /dev/random device with increment of kernel counter of available entropy in pool. Requires superuser privileges to operate.
trans-unit.target: rndaddentropy -将池中可用熵的内核计数器增加，将收集到的熵写入 /dev/random 设备。需要超级用户特权才能运行。

trans-unit.source: stdout - writes collected entropy into standard output.
Contribute into /dev/random and increment entropy counter:
trans-unit.target: 贡献到 /dev/random 并增加熵计数器：

trans-unit.source: Credits
Cryptography background

Default poll interval is 60 seconds and such interval is chosen for a reason. drand generates entropy for each response using its /dev/urandom. On Linux urandom gets reinitialized from /dev/random each 1 minute. So there is no reason to fetch random data more often: responses between reinitializations are in functional dependence.
trans-unit.target: 默认轮询间隔为60秒，因此选择此间隔是有原因的。 drand 使用 /dev/urandom 为每个响应生成熵。在Linux上，每1分钟从 /dev/random 重新初始化 urandom 。因此，没有理由更频繁地获取随机数据：重新初始化之间的响应与功能有关。

trans-unit.source: Deployment
Distributed Randomness Beacon client
trans-unit.target: 分布式随机性信标客户端

trans-unit.source: Download or clone repository and run following command in source code directory:
trans-unit.target: 下载或克隆版本库,在源代码目录下运行以下命令。

trans-unit.source: Entropy portions from beacon servers are mixed using stateful HKDF-based mixer. Each sufficient set of random responses is used to produce random output and new salt value for HKDF mixer. Therefore, mixer output becomes unpredictable after successful generation of first output, even if all beacon servers get compromised and start feeding client with biased data.
trans-unit.target: 来自信标服务器的熵部分使用基于状态的HKDF混合器进行混合。每一组足够的随机响应都被用来为HKDF混合器产生随机输出和新的盐值。因此,混合器的输出在成功生成第一个输出后变得不可预测,即使所有的信标服务器都被入侵,并开始向客户端提供有偏见的数据。

trans-unit.source: For logging into file see "Synopsis" section.
trans-unit.target: 登录文件请参见 "概要 "部分。

trans-unit.source: From PyPI
From source
Gathers entropy from multiple drand instances, securely mixes responses and outputs to kernel entropy pool or stdout. Suitable for use with League of Entropy servers (see "Running" section).
trans-unit.target: 收集来自多个drand实例的熵，安全地将响应和输出混合到内核熵池或stdout。适合与熵联盟服务器一起使用（请参阅“运行”部分）。

trans-unit.source: Installation
Jack Lloyd for BN256 implementation for Python
Requires Python 3.5.3+
Run with default sink:
Running
See deploy/drb-client.service for example of systemd unit file.
trans-unit.target: 有关systemd单元文件的示例，请参见deploy / drb-client.service。
